order: Order: Go to the Quick order or Products page to place an order
order_content: Go to checkout page: Go to the Checkout page or Product page to place an order
use_promocode: Use code: In the Checkout page, click the "Use promo codes" button, then select a code from the list or enter the code that you want to use, then click the "Use Now" button.
just_for_you_content: Join the <a1>Refer a Friend program</a1>, <a2>Redeem your points</a2> to receive your own code
